title: Special Presidential Task Force on Recovery of State Assets
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, the President to establish a Special Presidential Task Force to investigate, identify, trace, seize and transfer to Sri Lanka, State assets and revenue due to the Government of Sri Lanka which have been illegally or unlawfully acquired or procured by Sri Lankan Nationals and other persons acting on behalf of Sri Lankan nationals or otherwise, and are being concealed or kept outside the territory of Sri Lanka  by such persons and others acting on their behalf, and take effective steps to cause their seizure and transfer or return to Sri Lanka to be confiscated and vested in the General Treasury, was approved by the Cabinet.
